radiographic_examinations.findings: Dependent atelectases within the visualized lung bases, no pleural effusion, unremarkable heart and pericardium, diverticulosis throughout the colon, marked inflammatory stranding and wall thickening within the sigmoid colon, multiple foci of extraluminal air adjacent to the sigmoid colon and scattered throughout the abdomen, small hiatal hernia with reflux of contrast, normal appendix, mild degenerative changes at L5-S1.
